Interface Service<S extends Session>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Hive, Service, Service, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractServiceImpl, Hive, Hive, Hive, Hive, Hive, Hive, Hive, HiveCommon, HiveImpl, ServiceCommon, ServiceImpl, ServiceImpl, ServiceImpl

    public interface Service<S extends Session>

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeSession(S session)
      Close the provided session Closing the session includes: unregistering from all items, canceling all running operations
      createSession(java.util.Properties props, CallbackHandler callbackHandler)
      Create a new session for further accessing the hive

    • Method Detail

      • createSession

         createSession(java.util.Properties props,
                  CallbackHandler callbackHandler)
        Create a new session for further accessing the hive
        Parameters:
        props - properties used to create the session
        Returns:
        a new session
        Throws:
        UnableToCreateSessionException - in the case the session could not be created
        Since:
        1.1

      • closeSession

        void closeSession(S session)
                  throws InvalidSessionException
        Close the provided session Closing the session includes: unregistering from all items, canceling all running operations
        Parameters:
        session - the session to close
        Throws:
        InvalidSessionException - In the case the session is not a valid session
